Introduction.title: SQL — Introduction
Introduction.body: SQL manages relational databases using structured queries.

Theory.title: SQL — Theory
Theory.body: Core concepts: normalization, indexes, transactions, ACID properties.
Theory.code: SELECT id, name FROM users WHERE active = 1 ORDER BY name;

Interview Questions.title: SQL — Interview Questions
Interview Questions.body:
Q: What is normalization?
A: Organizing data to reduce redundancy.
